abilities.description: You are an agent of the law from a nearby locality. Envision where your authority comes from. When you invoke the law and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.9f538fabf8998c5b]{Compel} a person familiar with the authority you are associated with, boost.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.9c9ab6a42daa96e0]{Swear an Iron Vow} (formidable or greater) to bring a lawbreaker to justice, reroll any dice. After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.985a5415860a99e9]{Fulfill Your Vow} and score a hit, if you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.05909d6310d209a6]{Make a Connection} with a victim of the criminal, add +2.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.13b2d777c6fb719d]{Gather Information} while investigating a crime, you may roll a three dice challenge. On a miss with a match, envision what you learn of a deepening conspiracy or betrayal, make the rank of your quest one higher (no greater than epic), and use the new rank when marking future progress.
